alert.note: Alert for Eastern Highland; Northern Virginia Blue Ridge; Western Highland (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued March 04 at 2:59AM EST until March 04 at 4:00PM EST by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM EST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...West winds 35 to 45 mph with gusts up to 65 mph. * WHERE...Portions of the Allegheny Highlands and the Blue Ridge Mountains of Virginia. * WHEN...Until 4 PM EST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are expected. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Any remaining ice accretion from earlier freezing rain will result in greater chances for tree damage.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Highland; Northern Virginia Blue Ridge; Western Highland
